query.statement:
SELECT T.MANDT ,T.POSID AS PSPID ,T.POSID_1 ,T.ZSITE_NM ,T.ZQNTY ,T.TEMNO2 ,T.VALUE ,M12.LIFNR AS LIFNR ,M12.NAME1 , M12.TELF1 ,(SELECT X.CELLP FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 AS X WHERE M12.MANDT = X.MANDT AND M12.LIFNR = X.LIFNR AND T.TEMNO2 = X.TEMNO AND X.POSIT = 'X' AND X.GBN = 'A') AS CELLP , VALUE((SELECT SUM(M.EQME53+M.EQME55+M.EQME56+M.EQME57+M.EQME58+M.EQME59+M.EQME60+M.EQME61+M.EQME62+M.EQME63+M.EQME64+M.EQME65+M.EQME66+M.EQME67+M.EQME69+M.EQME70+M.EQME71+M.EQME72+M.EQME73+M.EQME74+M.EQME91) * 100 FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS M WHERE T.MANDT = M.MANDT AND T.POSID = M.PSPID AND T.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '91', '92') AND T.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND M.DIV = '5' ), 0) AS NETWR , 'N' AS INSERT_INDC -- ,'0053037040' AS HKONT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT MASTER01A.MANDT ,MASTER01A.POSID ,MASTER01A.ZSITE_NM ,MASTER01A.ZQNTY ,MASTER02B.VALUE ,MASTER02C.LIFNR ,MASTER02C.POSID_1 ,MASTER02C.TEMNO2 ,MASTER02C.ZZGUBUN ,MASTER02C.PRART
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MASTER01A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SD.MANDT ,SD.POSID ,SUM(SD.VALUE) AS VALUE -- ,SD.LIFNR -- ,SD.TEMNO2 FROM ( SELECT MASTER02A.MANDT ,MASTER02A.POSID ,ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SD0005.HOGI ORDER BY SD0005.HOGI , SD0005.SEQ DESC ) AS RN ,(CASE WHEN VALUE(SD0005.VALUE,'0') = '' THEN 0 ELSE INT(VALUE(SD0005.VALUE,'0')) END) AS VALUE ,MASTER02A.LIFNR ,MASTER02A.TEMNO2 FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS SD0005 ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 MASTER02A WHERE SD0005.MANDT = MASTER02A.MANDT AND MASTER02A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MASTER02A.POSID = #PSPID# AND MASTER02A.ZZGUBUN IN ('10','13') -- 제품구분(10:EL,13:EL선박) AND MASTER02A.PRART IN ('01','11') -- 프로젝트유형(01:승강기(국내),11:교체공사) AND SD0005.HOGI = MASTER02A.POSID_1 AND SD0005.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ASTQ' -- 정지층수 ) AS SD WHERE SD.RN = 1 GROUP BY SD.MANDT,SD.POSID-- ,SD.LIFNR ,SD.TEMNO2 ) AS MASTER02B ON MASTER01A.MANDT = MASTER02B.MANDT AND MASTER01A.POSID = MASTER02B.POSID ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS MASTER02C WHERE MASTER01A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MASTER01A.POSID = #PSPID# AND MASTER01A.MANDT = MASTER02C.MANDT AND MASTER01A.POSID = MASTER02C.POSID ) AS T LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M12 ON T.MANDT = M12.MANDT AND T.LIFNR = M12.LIFNR
ORDER BY T.POSID_1
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
